sentences.en: A lioness yawns inside her cage at Buenos Aires Zoo in Argentina.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷的布宜诺斯艾利斯动物园,一只母狮在笼子里“狮子大开口”.

sentences.en: And as Thecla sat upon her back,the lioness licked her feet, and all the crowed was amazed.
sentences.cn: 特格拉坐在雌狮背上，雌狮舔她的脚，所有人惊讶不已

sentences.en: He resolved at last to brave the lioness in her den.
sentences.cn: 最后,他决定斗胆到狮穴里去会会那只母狮子.

sentences.en: Like a lion they crouch and lie down, like a lioness - who dares to rouse them?
sentences.cn: 他蹲如公狮,卧如母狮,谁敢惹他,凡给你祝福的,愿他蒙福.

sentences.en: Lioness, Queen of the Battle, Hearken and Remember!
sentences.cn: 母狮,战争之后, 聆听并记住!

sentences.en: One morning when a vixen was taking her babies out of the lair, she saw a lioness and her cub.
sentences.cn: 一天清早,雌狐狸带着她的孩子走出巢穴, 看见了母狮子和她的孩子.

sentences.en: She started to pace the office like a lioness in a cage.
sentences.cn: 她开始在办公室里走来走去,就像笼子里的一只母狮子.

sentences.en: She was just looking around for her lover, when a lioness appeared.
sentences.cn: 正当她向四周搜寻自己的爱人时,一只雌狮出现了.

sentences.en: Suddenly, he find his wife, a lioness is slowly walking towards him!
sentences.cn: 忽然, 他发现家里那只母狮正慢慢走来!

sentences.en: The lion perishes andcubes of the lioness are scattered.
sentences.cn: 老狮子因绝食而死.母狮之子也都离散.

sentences.en: The lion perishes for lack of prey , and the cubs of the lioness are scattered.
sentences.cn: 11老狮子因绝食而死.母狮之子也都离散.

sentences.en: The lioness crouched ready to strike.
sentences.cn: 母狮低伏著身子准备攻击.

sentences.en: The lioness defends her cubs against enemies.
sentences.cn: 母狮保护幼狮不受敌人侵害.

sentences.en: The lioness secreted her cubs in the tall grass.
sentences.cn: 母狮子把她的幼崽藏在深密的草丛中.

sentences.en: Who was the lioness trying to eat pumbaa?
sentences.cn: 想要吃掉彭彭的母狮子是谁?

words.tran_cn: 狮子；名人；勇猛的人；社交场合的名流
